programme.title: Operation Christmas List
programme.desc: 12-year-old Barney has a plan to beat the Christmas rush and buy the entire stock of the most sought after gift, Crabby Mousie doll, the night before they go on sale.

programme.title: From Italy with Amore
programme.desc: In the quest to find her dream man, Ariel meets Daniel who shows that food is the way to her heart.

programme.title: At Home With Tori
programme.desc: Tori teams up with Million Dollar Matchmaker Patti Stanger to host a series of dates for Morgan, one of her single friends.

programme.title: At Home With Tori
programme.desc: Tori teams up with Million Dollar Matchmaker Patti Stanger to host a series of dates for Morgan, one of her single friends.

programme.title: New Dogs, Old Tricks
programme.desc: Liz and Kappa Psi Psi prep for Gamma Fair and T-shirt sales. Alan’s class inspires Anna’s look change.

programme.title: Food for the Heart
programme.desc: After taking on too much with her meal delivery service, Lia accepts her neighbor Eli’s help.

programme.title: Vote One For Love
programme.desc: Candace is unexpectedly tasked with helping her former high school rival win a mayoral race.

programme.title: A Match for the Prince
programme.desc: A matchmaker risks falling for a real-life prince before his royal wedding date.

programme.title: Cowboy & Indiana
programme.desc: With new found hope, former world champion bull rider is given a dangerous shot to regain his former glory.

programme.title: Best Friend From Heaven
programme.desc: When her dog is killed, Tara cancels her wedding. But her dog's ghost and her small town have a surprise.

programme.title: When Love Came To Town
programme.desc: Abby, an author is used to making up quirky, charming characters, but here in Bliss they have sprung to life.

programme.title: The Fabric of Christmas
programme.desc: Liam, a fireman, and Amy, a quilting teacher, team up to make a Christmas quilt for Liam's sister.

programme.title: Be Mine
programme.desc: A woman finds romance as she prepares to take over her mother's garden store.

programme.title: Christmas in Scotland
programme.desc: On vacation in Scotland, an installation designer enters a festive contest with a local heir.

programme.title: A Father's Choice
programme.desc: An unforgettable story about the promise and the power of family.

programme.title: Merry In-Laws
programme.desc: A surprise awaits a single mother when she becomes engaged to the son of Santa Claus.

programme.title: Meet Me in New York
programme.desc: Events planner Kelly meets her match in web editor Joe when planning his niece's birthday party.

programme.title: Campus Caller
programme.desc: When a university student goes missing, her mother a former cop goes in search for her.

programme.title: Three Dates to Forever
programme.desc: When John's new dating app pairs him with radio host Maddie, sparks start to fly.

programme.title: With Love, Your Sweetly Salted
programme.desc: Critic Alison goes undercover at a restaurant she slated, but ends up falling for the chef.

programme.title: Cradle of Lies
programme.desc: Marissa was in a coma while pregnant and wakes up five years later to find that the baby she delivered is gone.

programme.title: Buried Secrets
programme.desc: A cop-turned-writer creates suspicion when she publishes her first novel.

programme.title: Dear Santa
programme.desc: A privileged woman falls for a soup kitchen owner after reading his 7-year-old daughter's letter to Santa.

programme.title: Pure Country 2: The Gift
programme.desc: Three angels bestow the gift of song to a young girl, who rises to fame and fortune as a country music star.

programme.title: Sonny Boy
programme.desc: A small-town crime boss accepts delivery of a stolen car, only to find there's a baby in the back-seat. He and his transgender wife cut out the boy's tongue and raise him as a mute accomplice in their crimes. When the grown "Sonny Boy" escapes and tries to make contact with the outside world, the attention he draws to his warped family results in darkly-humored mayhem.

programme.title: Christmas Evil
programme.desc: In this comedic horror movie, a toymaker tries to make the Christmas spirit a reality, becoming obsessed with the behavior of children and the quality of the toys he makes. When he is met with hypocrisy and cynicism, he snaps and goes on a killing spree.

programme.title: Attack Force Z
programme.desc: A group of Australian commandos launch a secret mission against Japanese forces in World II.

programme.title: The Grasshopper
programme.desc: Christine Adams leaves her small town in British Columbia at age 19 to follow her boyfriend to L.A., where he works for a bank. She soon gets bored and moves to Las Vegas and becomes a showgirl, eventually slipping into prostitution.

programme.title: Wild For The Night
programme.desc: A loner fresh out of rehab and hunted by both sides of the law returns home to solve the murder of his sister, and finds himself entangled in a game of revenge on the LA club circuit.

programme.title: Jennifer Lopez: Dance Again
programme.desc: A documentary that chronicles Jennifer Lopez's life on and off-stage during her first ever world tour. Throughout the majority of her music career, beginning in 1999, a world tour by Lopez was anticipated, though it never materialized. Following the release of her seventh studio album Love? (2011), she was more intent on touring than ever. However, it was not until March 2012 when the tour came into the works. As rumors began to circulate, Lopez later confirmed that April that she would be embar.

programme.title: Casino Jack
programme.desc: Based on a true story, a hot shot Washington DC lobbyist and his protégé go down hard as their schemes to peddle influence lead to corruption and murder.

programme.title: Thelma & Louise
programme.desc: Los Angeles, 1969. TV star Rick Dalton, a struggling actor specializing in westerns, and stuntman Cliff Booth, his best friend, try to survive in a constantly changing movie industry. Dalton is the neighbor of the young and promising actress and model Sharon Tate, who has just married the prestigious Polish director Roman Polanski….

programme.title: The Frozen Ground
programme.desc: An Alaska State Trooper partners with a young woman who escaped the clutches of serial killer Robert Hansen to bring the murderer to justice. Based on actual events.

programme.title: Kill Bill: Vol. 1
programme.desc: An assassin is shot by her ruthless employer, Bill, and other members of their assassination circle – but she lives to plot her vengeance.

programme.title: Big Eyes
programme.desc: The story of the awakening of painter, Margaret Keane, her phenomenal success in the 1950s, and the subsequent legal difficulties she had with her husband, who claimed credit for her works in the 1960s.

programme.title: Empire Records
programme.desc: The employees of an independent music store learn about each other as they try anything to stop the store being absorbed by a large chain.

programme.title: Street Kings
programme.desc: Tom Ludlow is a disillusioned L.A. Police Officer, rarely playing by the rules and haunted by the death of his wife. When evidence implicates him in the execution of a fellow officer, he is forced to go up against the cop culture he's been a part of his entire career, ultimately leading him to question the loyalties of everyone around him.

programme.title: The Transporter Refueled
programme.desc: The fast-paced action movie is again set in the criminal underworld in France, where Frank Martin is known as The Transporter, because he is the best driver and mercenary money can buy. In this installment, he meets Anna and they attempt to take down a group of ruthless Russian human traffickers who also have kidnapped Frank’s father.

programme.title: Agent Cody Banks
programme.desc: Recruited by the U.S. government to be a special agent, nerdy teenager Cody Banks must get closer to cute classmate Natalie in order to learn about an evil plan hatched by her father. But despite the agent persona, Cody struggles with teen angst.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible
